options.content:
# Data availability

This dashboard relies on optional metrics.
We need to enable network monitoring at the installation level and on each cluster for the metrics to be available.
Please contact team Atlas for more information.

targets.expr:
topk(
  10,
  sum by (k8s_src_namespace, cluster_id) (
    rate(
      beyla_network_flow_bytes_total{
        dst_address=~"^(10\\..*|100\\.(1[0-9][0-9]|[6-9][0-9]|[1-9])\\..*|172\\.(1[6-9]|2[0-9]|3[01])\\..*|192\\.168\\..*)",
        direction="request",
        src_zone!="",
        dst_zone!="",
        cluster_id="${cluster_id}"
      }[$__rate_interval]
    )
    unless on (dst_zone, src_zone)
      label_replace(beyla_network_flow_bytes_total{src_zone!="", dst_zone!=""},
        "dst_zone", "$1", "src_zone", "(.*)")
  )
)

sum(
  sum by (k8s_src_namespace, cluster_id) (
    rate(
      beyla_network_flow_bytes_total{
        dst_address=~"^(10\\..*|100\\.(1[0-9][0-9]|[6-9][0-9]|[1-9])\\..*|172\\.(1[6-9]|2[0-9]|3[01])\\..*|192\\.168\\..*)",
        direction="request",
        src_zone!="",
        dst_zone!="",
        cluster_id="${cluster_id}"
      }[$__rate_interval]
    )
    unless on (dst_zone, src_zone)
      label_replace(beyla_network_flow_bytes_total{src_zone!="", dst_zone!=""},
        "dst_zone", "$1", "src_zone", "(.*)")
  )
)
or vector(0)

sum(
  sum by (k8s_src_namespace, cluster_id) (
    rate(
      beyla_network_flow_bytes_total{
        dst_address=~"^(10\\..*|100\\.(1[0-9][0-9]|[6-9][0-9]|[1-9])\\..*|172\\.(1[6-9]|2[0-9]|3[01])\\..*|192\\.168\\..*)",
        direction="request",
        src_zone!="",
        dst_zone!="",
        cluster_id="${cluster_id}"
      }[$__rate_interval]
    )
    and on (dst_zone, src_zone)
      label_replace(beyla_network_flow_bytes_total{src_zone!="", dst_zone!=""},
        "dst_zone", "$1", "src_zone", "(.*)")
  )
)
or vector(0)

panels.description: Displays the total bytes sent for public traffic.

panels.title: Total Private Traffic
Private Traffic vs. Public Traffic per namespace

targets.expr:
sum(
  sum by (k8s_src_namespace, cluster_id) (
    rate(
      beyla_network_flow_bytes_total{
        dst_address=~"^(10\\..*|100\\.(1[0-9][0-9]|[6-9][0-9]|[1-9])\\..*|172\\.(1[6-9]|2[0-9]|3[01])\\..*|192\\.168\\..*)",
        direction="request",
        src_zone!="",
        dst_zone!="",
        cluster_id="${cluster_id}",
        k8s_src_namespace=~"${namespace}"
      }[$__rate_interval]
    )
    unless on (dst_zone, src_zone)
      label_replace(beyla_network_flow_bytes_total{src_zone!="", dst_zone!=""},
        "dst_zone", "$1", "src_zone", "(.*)")
  )
)
or vector(0)

sum(
  sum by (k8s_src_namespace, cluster_id) (
    rate(
      beyla_network_flow_bytes_total{
        dst_address=~"^(10\\..*|100\\.(1[0-9][0-9]|[6-9][0-9]|[1-9])\\..*|172\\.(1[6-9]|2[0-9]|3[01])\\..*|192\\.168\\..*)",
        direction="request",
        src_zone!="",
        dst_zone!="",
        cluster_id="${cluster_id}",
        k8s_src_namespace=~"${namespace}"
      }[$__rate_interval]
    )
    and on (dst_zone, src_zone)
      label_replace(beyla_network_flow_bytes_total{src_zone!="", dst_zone!=""},
        "dst_zone", "$1", "src_zone", "(.*)")
  )
)
or vector(0)

targets.expr:
topk(10, sum by (k8s_src_namespace, cluster_id) (
  rate(
    beyla_network_flow_bytes_total{
      dst_address=~"^(10\\..*|100\\.(1[0-9][0-9]|[6-9][0-9]|[1-9])\\..*|172\\.(1[6-9]|2[0-9]|3[01])\\..*|192\\.168\\..*)",
      direction="request",
      src_zone!="",
      dst_zone!="",
      cluster_id="${cluster_id}",
      k8s_src_namespace=~"$namespace"
    }[$__rate_interval]
  )
  unless on (dst_zone, src_zone)
    label_replace(beyla_network_flow_bytes_total{src_zone!="", dst_zone!=""},
      "dst_zone", "$1", "src_zone", "(.*)")
))
